meanings.definition: A type of corn that has been dried and treated with an alkali.
meanings.sent1: The hominies were used to make a traditional corn soup.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a delicious stew with hominies and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The hominies in the pantry were telling jokes to the beans.
meanings.sent4: The hominies stood tall in the pot, ready to absorb the flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the hominies filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A dish made from ground hominy and meat, typically served in the southern United States.
meanings.sent1: The hominies on the plate looked hearty and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed a traditional southern meal of hominies and fried chicken.
meanings.sent3: The hominies at the picnic were the life of the party.
